languages.text: {n}В глазах Соломона впервые возникает живой огонек, его губы изгибаются в дерзкой усмешке. Напрягая все тело, арбитр начинает выламывать твердое дерево кровати. С оглушительным треском он рвется к вам, яростный, страстный и живой.{/n}

{n}Solomorne's eyes light up for the first time, his lips curving into a cocky grin. With a full-body effort, he begins to break away from the hard wood of the bed. With a deafening crack, he lunges toward you, fierce, passionate, and alive.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В глазах Соломона впервые возникает живой огонек, его губы изгибаются в дерзкой усмешке. Напрягая все тело, арбитр начинает выламывать твердое дерево кровати. С оглушительным треском он рвется к вам, яростный, страстный и живой.{/n}

{n}Solomorne's eyes light up for the first time, his lips curving into a cocky grin. With a full-body effort, he begins to break away from the hard wood of the bed. With a deafening crack, he lunges toward you, fierce, passionate, and alive.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ses yeux s'illuminent pour la première fois et un sourire impertinent se dessine sur ses lèvres. En y mettant tout son corps, il commence à tirer sur les menottes accrochées au bois dur du lit, puis se libère dans un craquement assourdissant et se jette sur vous, sauvage, passionné et vivant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's eyes light up for the first time, his lips curving into a cocky grin. With a full-body effort, he begins to break away from the hard wood of the bed. With a deafening crack, he lunges toward you, fierce, passionate, and alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ses yeux s'illuminent pour la première fois et un sourire impertinent se dessine sur ses lèvres. En y mettant tout son corps, il commence à tirer sur les menottes accrochées au bois dur du lit, puis se libère dans un craquement assourdissant et se jette sur vous, sauvage, passionné et vivant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの目に、初めて光が宿り、唇には得意げな笑みが浮かんだ。彼は全身の力を込めて、堅い木製のベッドから身体を起こした。そして轟音とともに、激しく、情熱的に、そして生き生きと、あなたへと飛びかかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's eyes light up for the first time, his lips curving into a cocky grin. With a full-body effort, he begins to break away from the hard wood of the bed. With a deafening crack, he lunges toward you, fierce, passionate, and alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの目に、初めて光が宿り、唇には得意げな笑みが浮かんだ。彼は全身の力を込めて、堅い木製のベッドから身体を起こした。そして轟音とともに、激しく、情熱的に、そして生き生きと、あなたへと飛びかかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Por primera vez, los ojos de Solomorne se iluminan y su boca forma una sonrisa audaz. Con un tremendo esfuerzo, logra separarse de la madera de la cama y, con un crujido tremendo se abalanza sobre ti. Es feroz, apasionado y vivaz.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's eyes light up for the first time, his lips curving into a cocky grin. With a full-body effort, he begins to break away from the hard wood of the bed. With a deafening crack, he lunges toward you, fierce, passionate, and alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Por primera vez, los ojos de Solomorne se iluminan y su boca forma una sonrisa audaz. Con un tremendo esfuerzo, logra separarse de la madera de la cama y, con un crujido tremendo se abalanza sobre ti. Es feroz, apasionado y vivaz.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙的目光第一次亮了起来，嘴角露出了傲慢的笑容。随后，他使出全身的力量，试图从硬木床上挣脱下来。随着一声震耳欲聋的木头碎裂声，他朝你扑了过来，凶狠、热情、充满活力。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's eyes light up for the first time, his lips curving into a cocky grin. With a full-body effort, he begins to break away from the hard wood of the bed. With a deafening crack, he lunges toward you, fierce, passionate, and alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙的目光第一次亮了起来，嘴角露出了傲慢的笑容。随后，他使出全身的力量，试图从硬木床上挣脱下来。随着一声震耳欲聋的木头碎裂声，他朝你扑了过来，凶狠、热情、充满活力。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un gözleri ilk kez parıldıyor, dudaklarında sinsi bir gülümseme beliriyor. Tüm gücünü kullanarak yatağın sağlam ahşabından kurtulmaya başlıyor. Sağır edici bir çatırtı duyuluyor. Haşin, tutkulu ve arzu dolu bir hamleyle üzerine atılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's eyes light up for the first time, his lips curving into a cocky grin. With a full-body effort, he begins to break away from the hard wood of the bed. With a deafening crack, he lunges toward you, fierce, passionate, and alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'un gözleri ilk kez parıldıyor, dudaklarında sinsi bir gülümseme beliriyor. Tüm gücünü kullanarak yatağın sağlam ahşabından kurtulmaya başlıyor. Sağır edici bir çatırtı duyuluyor. Haşin, tutkulu ve arzu dolu bir hamleyle üzerine atılıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomornes Augen erstrahlen zum ersten Mal, als er seine Lippen zu einem übermütigen Grinsen verzieht. Er fängt an, sich mit all seiner Kraft vom harten Holz des Bettes zu befreien. Dann stürzte er sich begleitet von einem lauten Knacken leidenschaftlich und voller Leben auf dich.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's eyes light up for the first time, his lips curving into a cocky grin. With a full-body effort, he begins to break away from the hard wood of the bed. With a deafening crack, he lunges toward you, fierce, passionate, and alive.{/n}

Er fängt an, sich mit all seiner Kraft vom harten Holz des Bettes zu befreien. Dann stürzte er sich begleitet von einem lauten Knacken leidenschaftlich und voller Leben auf dich.{/n}
